name: Twine2
body:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
<title>Are you co-operative</title>
<style title="Twine CSS">@-webkit-keyframes appear{0%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@keyframes appear{0%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@-webkit-keyframes fade-in-out{0%,to{opacity:0}50%{opacity:1}}@keyframes fade-in-out{0%,to{opacity:0}50%{opacity:1}}@-webkit-keyframes rumble{50%{-webkit-transform:translateY(-.2em);transform:translateY(-.2em)}}@keyframes rumble{50%{-webkit-transform:translateY(-.2em);transform:translateY(-.2em)}}@-webkit-keyframes shudder{50%{-webkit-transform:translateX(0.2em);transform:translateX(0.2...(line truncated)...
</head>

<body>

<tw-story></tw-story>

<tw-storydata name="Are you co-operative" startnode="1" creator="Twine" creator-version="2.0.8" ifid="8CEFE9DD-447B-449E-A8C8-4EF41DABE35A" format="Harlowe" options=""><style role="stylesheet" id="twine-user-stylesheet" type="text/twine-css">body {
  background: url();
}
body {
  background:
     url(https://www.flickr.com/photos/137318434@N06/22956419651/)    /* image */
     top center / 100% /* position / size */
     no-repeat                /* repeat */
     
}</style><script role="script" id="twine-user-script" type="text/twine-javascript"></script><tw-passagedata pid="1" name="Are you Co-operative? 10 questions to help you find-out " tags="" position="533,39">Do you think that the ethics of how a business is run matter?

[[Yes]]

[[No]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="2" name="Yes" tags="" position="537,196">Do you care who owns the business?

[[Yes, it's about values and ethos]]

[[Not bothered]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="3" name="No" tags="" position="1383,527">Co-operatives do care about values and ethics, so probably not. </tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="4" name="Not bothered" tags="" position="744,267">Do you think it makes a difference who owns a business?

[[Yes, it's about values and ethos]]

[[No, they're all the same]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="5" name="Yes, it's about values and ethos" tags="" position="522,370">Do you care about how a business treats its employees and customers?

[[Of course]]

[[Yes, but prices also matter]]

[[No, just prices]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="6" name="No, they're all the same" tags="" position="874,413">If who owned a business could affect how it treated its employees and customers, would you care about who owned it?

[[I would care then]]

[[No, still wouldn't]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="7" name="I would care then" tags="" position="756,545">Would you like to be able to influence how a business makes these decisions without being a rich shareholder?

[[I would]]

[[I wouldn't]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="8" name="No, still wouldn't" tags="" position="983,544">Co-operators do care how a business treats its employees and customers, so you're probably not a co-operator.</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="9" name="Of course" tags="" position="334,541">Would you like to be able to influence how a business makes these decisions without being a rich shareholder?

[[I would]]

[[I wouldn't]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="10" name="No, just prices" tags="" position="584,541">Co-operators do care how a business treats its employees and customers, so you're probably not a co-operator.</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="11" name="Yes, but prices also matter" tags="" position="459,542">Would you like to be able to influence how a business makes these decisions without being a rich shareholder?

[[I would]]

[[I wouldn't]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="12" name="I would" tags="" position="519,705">Do you believe others should be able to influence how a business is run as well, regardless of race, religion, sexual orientation, and wealth?

[[Of course they should]]

[[No, there should be some exceptions]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="13" name="I wouldn't" tags="" position="694,704">Would you like to shop with a business where people who care about values and ethics are in charge?

[[I would like to support a business like that]]

[[No]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="14" name="I would like to support a business like that" tags="" position="695,857">

<a href="https://youtu.be/ecSMtMurwsI">Find-out more</a>

<a href="http://www.uk.coop/directory">Find a co-operative near you</a></tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="15" name="Of course they should" tags="" position="424,859">Do you think members should be able to control how a business is run?

[[If they shop there, work there, or contribute to its success - yes]]

[[Doesn't matter if they shop or work there - let the people run it]]

[[No, leave that to executives, they'll do what's best]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="16" name="No, there should be some exceptions" tags="" position="559,857">Co-operators believe in voluntary and open membership of businesses, for everyone, so you're probably not a co-operator.</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="17" name="If they shop there, work there, or contribute to its success - yes" tags="" position="731,1015">Do you think that members should get to decide, by voting, on who...(line truncated)...

[[If they're going to run it then yes]]

[[No, leave that to executives, they'll do what's best]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="18" name="Doesn't matter if they shop or work there - let the people run it" tags="" position="320,1018">Co-operators believe in members' economic participation, so that only those who have a direct interest in a business determine how it's run; you're probably not a co-operator.</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="19" name="No, leave that to executives, they'll do what's be...(line truncated)...

[[Yes, training is important]]

[[No, that's up to them]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="21" name="No, that's up to them" tags="" position="871,1357">Education and training is a core part of co-operation, it might not be for you.</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="22" name="Yes, training is important" tags="" position="563,1335">If your business had an opportunity to work with another ethical member-owned business and help it, in a way that could help your business too, should it do it?

[[Sounds like a great idea]]

[[No, my business is my concern]]</tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="23" name="Sounds like a great idea" tags="" position="423,1507">Do you want your community and the people in it to do well too?

[[Absolutely, why wouldn't I]]

[[No, my business is my concern]] </tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="24" name="No, my business is my concern" tags="" position="671,1514">This doesn't mean you can't co-operate in other ways, but this is not really co-operative. </tw-passagedata><tw-passagedata pid="25" name="Absolutely, why wouldn't I" tags="" position="423,1657">You are co-operative! You are a born co-operator! 

<a href="https://youtu.be/90FL_bBE4mw">Find-out more</a>

<a href="http://www.uk.coop/directory">Find others who share your values at a co-operative near you</a></tw-passagedata></tw-storydata>
